response.original_title: Darren Johnson: Full-Time Highschooler, Part-Time Ninja
response.overview: Brought to you by Avery Raufer and Thomas Shaw  A student assignment turned full length feature film, Darren Johnson is the result of almost a year of work. We hope you enjoy.
response.title: Darren Johnson: Full-Time Highschooler, Part-Time Ninja
